name: Kael The Root-Slayer
description:
Kael the Root Slayer is a powerful druid as old as time itself having the sole purpose of protecting the sacred sapling of restoration, of which the entire world relies on as a single source of life. An invasive strangler fig species has found its way to the sacred sapling. The Strangler fig sucks up the nutrients from its victims, causing them to die.

It’s your sole responsibility to defend the sapling or die trying! Use your druid powers to fight against the strangler fig!

Use WASD to move and left mouse click to fire your abilities. Choose your upgrades by approaching the glowing blue tree in between each wave! Press Escape to pause the game.

Global Game Jam 2023

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/kael-root-slayer-9
